thread.title: Deadline nears for nonprofits to benefit
thread.title_full: Deadline nears for nonprofits to benefit

author: news@courierpublicationsllc.com (Staff)
title: Deadline nears for nonprofits to benefit
text:
Deadline nears for nonprofits to benefit Oct 13, 2015 
Camden — The deadline for submitting applications to be Midcoast Community Chorus’ Spring 2016 Concert Beneficiary is Saturday, Oct. 31. 
MCC performs at least two concerts a year, and its spring concert is dedicated to raising awareness and funds for local nonprofit organizations that address social injustices and community needs. With an average donation of $10,000 per concert, MCC has donated more than $65,000 since its founding in 2008. 
Organizations interested in applying must be a local nonprofit located within the greater Knox County area. All interested organizations are invited to submit an application online at mccsings.org ; or download the application and mail it to Midcoast Community Chorus, P.O. Box 192, Rockport, ME 04856. For more information, email info@mccsings.org or call 975-0582. 
Courier Publications’ A&E Editor Dagney C. Ernest can be reached at (207) 594-4401, ext. 115; or dernest@courierpublicationsllc.com.
